mapper.sql: DISTINCT s.id as s_id, s.start_date as s_start_date, s.end_date as s_end_date, s.del_flag as s_del_flag, s.create_date as s_create_date, s.update_date as s_update_date, s.status as s_status
c.id as c_id, c.ad_combo_name as c_comboName
t.id as t_id, t.ad_type_name as t_type_name

DISTINCT c.id as c_id, c.ad_combo_name as c_ad_combo_name, c.ad_is_flag as c_ad_is_flag, c.start_hour as c_start_hour, c.end_hour as c_end_hour, c.start_minutes as c_start_minutes, c.start_second as c_start_second, c.end_minutes as c_end_minutes, c.end_second as c_end_second, c.show_time as c_show_time, c.show_count as c_show_count, c.status as c_status, c.`week` as c_week, c.valid_start_time as c_valid_start_time, c.valid_end_time as c_valid_end_time, c.del_flag as c_del_flag

c.id as c_id, c.ad_combo_name as c_ad_combo_name, c.ad_is_flag as c_ad_is_flag, c.start_hour as c_start_hour, c.end_hour as c_end_hour, c.start_minutes as c_start_minutes, c.start_second as c_start_second, c.end_minutes as c_end_minutes, c.end_second as c_end_second, c.show_time as c_show_time, c.show_count as c_show_count, c.status as c_status, c.`week` as c_week, c.valid_start_time as c_valid_start_time, c.valid_end_time as c_valid_end_time, c.del_flag as c_del_flag

c.id as c_id, c.ad_combo_name as c_ad_combo_name, c.ad_is_flag as c_ad_is_flag, c.start_hour as c_start_hour, c.end_hour as c_end_hour, c.start_minutes as c_start_minutes, c.start_second as c_start_second, c.end_minutes as c_end_minutes, c.end_second as c_end_second, c.show_time as c_show_time, c.show_count as c_show_count, c.status as c_status, c.`week` as c_week, c.del_flag as c_del_flag

DISTINCT a.id As a_id, a.ad_name as a_ad_name, a.start_date as a_start_date, a.end_date as a_end_date, a.ad_add_text as a_ad_add_text, a.ad_id as a_ad_id, a.ad_flag as a_ad_flag, a.ad_status as a_ad_status, a.ad_format as a_ad_format, a.show_way as a_show_way, a.claim_date as a_claim_date, a.audit_date as a_audit_date, a.remarks as a_remarks, a.ad_play_time as a_ad_play_time, a.ad_is_sd as a_ad_is_sd, a.ad_is_hd as a_ad_is_hd
a.id as a_id, a.advertiser_id as a_advertiser_id, a.name as a_name
u.id as u_id, u.login_name as u_login_name, u.name as u_name
h.id as h_id, h.login_name as h_login_name, h.name as h_name
mapper.select: select distinct s.id from ad_sell s left join ad_combo c on s.ad_combo_id = c.id left join ad_advertiser a on s.advertiser_id = a.id left join ad_type t on c.ad_type_id = t.id where s.del_flag='0' AND a.id=#{advtersier_id} and t.id=#{typeId} and ((DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) or (DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ))

SELECT c.ad_type_id as ad_type_id, s.advertiser_id as advertiser_id, a.`name` as advertiser_name, COUNT(a.id) as `count` from ad_sell s LEFT JOIN ad_combo c on s.ad_combo_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ad_advertiser a on s.advertiser_id = a.id where s.del_flag = '0' and c.del_flag = '0' and a.del_flag = '0'
and ( (DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) or (DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') )or (DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') )or (DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) )
group by c.ad_type_id,s.advertiser_id
